room_title: Escape room "The Wizard’s Last Quest" by Just Escape in New York
room_description: The great Wizard Merlin spent nearly a decade imprisoned and enslaved by the power hungry King of Swords. Dedicated followers of Merlin, you and your fellow apprentices have been captured by the King and thrown into the dungeon, awaiting your execution. You have but one chance to escape… by retrieving the magical emerald, the source of the King’s dark and terrible power. With it, you can put an end to his sorcery once and for all. Be quick – the fate of the kingdom is in your hands. You may be blindfolded at certain points in this room.
